    Method
    Description
    private Boolean
    checkForOverlapTimes()
    Check for overlap times assigns needed parameters to variables to be sent to the TimeOverlap_Error_Handler and returns true or false based on if there is an overlap in time of already existing appointments for selected customer
    private void
    collectInputsAndSendToDA()
    Collect Inputs and Send to DA Assigns valid inputs to local variables for easy readability then sends the data to the database using the writeNewAppointmentDataToDB method in Appointments_DA

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • onCountrySelected

      public void onCountrySelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      On country selected. Clears division selection and makes sure that a country is selected by the user then if a country is selected, that county's respective divisions are loaded into the divisions ComboBox.
      Parameters:
      event - the event when the user selects a country

    • onCancelClick

      public void onCancelClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      On cancel click. returns user back to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      event - the event of user clicking cancel
      Throws:
      IOException - the io exception thrown

    • onScheduleClick

      public void onScheduleClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      On schedule click. checks to make sure there is a selected start and end time. After it validates the inputs and based on whether the inputs are valid or not, it will either show an error or send the data to be saved to the database and redirects user to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      event - the event of the user clicking schedule
      Throws:
      Exception - the exception

    • validateInputs

      public Boolean validateInputs()
      Validate inputs boolean. checks each input to see if its valid and meets business requirements. Is chained in order of how the form is laid out so that any invalid inputs are given errors in the order that they appear until they all pass validation.
      Returns:
      the boolean

    • checkForOverlapTimes

      private Boolean checkForOverlapTimes()
      Check for overlap times assigns needed parameters to variables to be sent to the TimeOverlap_Error_Handler and returns true or false based on if there is an overlap in time of already existing appointments for selected customer
      Returns:
      a boolean of whether there is an overlap in times for existing appointments for selected customer

    • collectInputsAndSendToDA

      private void collectInputsAndSendToDA()
      Collect Inputs and Send to DA Assigns valid inputs to local variables for easy readability then sends the data to the database using the writeNewAppointmentDataToDB method in Appointments_DA
